vocab.definition: the ability to learn, understand, and make judgments or have opinions that are based on reason
vocab.example: She has a high level of intelligence.

vocab.definition: a formal statement of the rules on which a subject of study is based or of ideas that are suggested to explain a fact or event or, more generally, an opinion or explanation
vocab.example: The theory of evolution is widely accepted.

cloze.text: Multiple intelligence theory suggests that there are several types of intelligence, including linguistic, logical-mathematical, spatial, bodily-kinesthetic, musical, interpersonal, intrapersonal, and naturalistic.
